name: R-man
description:
One of my favourite game is Rayman, thanks to this game, I enjoy plateformer game. I played on Rayman 2, 3, and Rayman Origins.I have done a character who let me think Rayman, so it's maybe not very good, but it's just a prototype.

-Use arrow or QSDZ to move.

-Use Space to jump or Z or Up Arrow.

I use only one soundtrack, is "Fig leaf rag" by Kevin Macleod( the composer is Scott Joplin)
